story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m sure Ethan’s going to choose Lugia.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
So we’ll be battling to show everyone which
Johto Legendary Pokémon is the strongest.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
It’ll be absolutely breathtaking to see those
two clash in battle!
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I chose you two to train against because I
want to win.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You know a lot about Legendary Pokémon,
so you must know how to draw out Ho-Oh’s
power, right?
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Well, I can teach you what I know, and
I can also be your training partner...
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: But you’ve got some figuring out to do.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Ho-Oh is a Legendary Pokémon that reveals
itself to pure-hearted Trainers.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: You should figure out why Ho-Oh chose you.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Understanding what makes your heart pure
will be the key to surpassing your limits.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_1600_10: What’re you all doing here? I didn’t call you.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: I called them! We all wanna help, Silver!
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_1900_10: We’ve got some strong opponents here.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I’d usually start by saying, “If it’s a mid-air
battle you want, leave it to me!”
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
But...I heard what kind of Trainer you are,
from the elder at Sprout Tower. He said
you’re way too harsh on your Pokémon.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_2400_10:
That’s why I wanna know why Ho-Oh
chose me.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_2700_10:
He’s been shaped by every one of his
encounters.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Silver. You and your Pokémon have bonded
with each other.
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
And you’ve also bonded with your comrades.
Let us test the strength of those bonds!
story_arceus_05_04000/2401_1001_3300_10: You can come at us all at once!
